entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
